needs: Seeking contract Cybersecurity Analyst work in Dubai focused on delivering measurable reductions in dwell time and detection coverage improvements. Aims include deploying SIEM/XDR detections, establishing runbooks, SLOs and dashboards, and delivering a thin vertical slice within the first 90 days while operating under governance, budget constraints and cross‑functional ambiguity.
personality: Collaborative and facilitative communicator who prioritizes reliability, inclusion and evidence. Prefers short, readable artifacts, experiments over debates, and surfacing unknowns early through probes. Values humane processes, clear accountability, and data‑driven iteration. Mentors peers via pairing and concise docs and focuses on turning ambiguous briefs into measurable milestones.
